post.description: Run a specific prompt based on the Prompt ID and Prompt Version ID passed in. Recommended when creating classifiers to make decisions, since full response is available for decision making

Run a specific prompt based on the Prompt ID and Prompt Version ID passed in. The results will be streamed using HTTP/2. Not recommended when creating classifiers to make decisions, since full response is not available for decision making.

Run a specific prompt based on the Prompt ID and Prompt Version ID passed in. The results will be streamed using SSE. Not recommended when creating classifiers to make decisions, since full response is not available for decision making.
Create a General Conversation, without targetting a Persona.

get.description: Get all the conversations for the specified caller, 10 at a time.

post.description: Start a Conversation with a Persona.

get.summary: Get All Conversations with a Persona
get.description: Get all the persona conversations for the specified caller, 10 at a time.
Get all the conversations for the caller and a specific external user, 10 at a time.

patch.description: Send a user message and continue an existing Conversation. Streams response using HTTP/2 (recommended).
Send a user message and continue an existing Conversation. Streams response using SSE.
Send a user message and continue an existing Conversation. Full response will be sent at once (not recommended especially for longer responses).

get.description: Get the Conversation based on the ConversationId passed in.

patch.description: Set the specified Conversation as active.
Set the status for a specified Conversation.
Set the Conversation's Score (while gathering user feedback).
Set the Message Score in a Conversation (while gathering user feedback).
Update the score parameters for a Prompt run based on User feedback.

post.description: Get Conversations for audit based on filter conditions passed in.
Get Prompt runs for audit based on filter conditions passed in.

get.description: Get details of a specific prompt run for audit.
Get details of a specific conversation run for audit.

post.description: Get Conversations for feedback analysis based on filter conditions passed in.
Get Prompt runs for feedback analysis based on filter conditions passed in.
Gets information on whether the user input contains any intent that is sexual, hatred, harassment, self-harm or violent in nature.
